channel.title: How do i add commands into my server?

item.title: How do i add commands into my server?
item.dc:creator: @doom_j doom_j
item.description:
@doom_j wrote:

most older servers use the customCommand() Method to hold all the commands, that is usually in the client.java, others use a separate class to handle the commands method usually named Commands or commandHandler.java. Some others use a hash Map or and array List for command parsing, but those are usually also packaged servers that have all the commands in another folder separate from the other files named like commands.

Read full topic
item.source: How do i add commands into my server?

item.title: How do i add commands into my server?
item.dc:creator: @iTzNoLannn iTzNoLannn
item.description:
@iTzNoLannn wrote:

Nahh open up youre Client.Java
hit Ctrl F and search CustomCommands

Just Copy one of the Commands Change the if command starts with (…) to Cash yahty yahty yahh

make Sure you Compile then Restart youre Server sorry i wasnt Very Descriptive, im Not on the Computer with my Server Files so i cant tell you the Exact Code… if you Really Dont understand it just tell me and ill get the Actual Codes for you.

additem(995,2147000000);

but when i add it to the client.java in my server then try it, it wont play the command… so anyhelp?
